Ordering clothing online is challenging for determining description for correct size, suitable style, fabric quality, accurate color. This top checked all the boxes and is the perfect dressy-casual as described online. It's a beefier fabric; not sheer, long sleeves have cuffs, nice stitching at the v-neck which is also not too low cut if wearing to work. It does run a little big, I could have ordered a Medium, but keeping the Large which is long enough to wear with leggings. I washed and dried it on delicate, it came out perfect and wrinkle free. A good purchase for the price!
I love this top isflatting very comfortable  a great value o

I love the pattern on this shirt.  It's made from quality material and comfortable.  The chest area of the top is a tighter fit than I'd like.  Still like the look, so I'll wear it.  Good value overall.
Cute shirt fits well good material and stretch would recommend
Dressy casual that I like because I can wear it to work , or to go out with friends, or to go anywhere really, it is cute, comfortable. breathable.

评论概述: Looks great, comfortable to wear and more of a dressy top than casual IMO
评论详情: I like every single thing about this top, the raised texture, the beautiful well saturated colors, not too hot and not too cold.  Everything.  However, this is a top that I wouldn't categorize as "casual", it is very nice and I will wear it to church, out with the girls, etc.  Too nice for everyday wear!
Cute pattern, thicker material than wife expected. Hangs nicely, washes nicely, almost a ribbed texture that wife wasn't expecting, but doesn't take away from the look.
The shirt is great for fall weather, warm yet light weight and cool. Is a perfect fit, machine washer safe tho I do hang dry ,no color fading after 3 washes  it is a great stylish shirt made to last.

Not only is this shirt beautiful, but it feels really nice and soft. The texture makes it a bit heavy for this time of year (I'm in Texas). And with it being 100+ outside I instantly regretted putting it on without checking the temp.  I was fine inside, but outside it felt heavy.  I like how flowy this is. I don't like shirts that cling to me. The sleeves are a tad too long, and it has button cuffs, with an extra button sewed onto the tag. The raised texture is not only pretty but feels nice too.  To me this isn't a casual top. It's more for church, work, or date night. I plan on wearing this a lot more once the weather changes.
I'm not a fan of the ribbed look and couldn't see that before I ordered (my bad) but also runs small. Size up one if you're in the question mark like I am.
This shirt is loose fitting and stretchy material. It is a medium weight shirt. It gas a longer fit. It is soft and flattering.

This could have been 5 stars but the cuffs are far too large. I will have to move the button over on them. Under the V=neck there is a pleat but when you put the shirt on it stretches the pleat out enough that it looks to tight across your chest. I couldn't have gotten a larger size or I would have drowned in it, as it is the sleeves are long the shirt is long and the shoulders are just a bit over my shoulders, so bigger would have not been better. It is still doable and others may not notice it. I washed it in cold water and put in the dryer for a few minutes and then hung to dry and it came out fine.

The texture of this top is absolutely beautiful. It has a gorgeous field of daisies on white. The colors will make it very nice dressed up or worn more casually. With long sleeves, the cool material is just right to keep the breeze off but not let you get too hot.  I can’t explain how much I love the texture of this top.  It is awesome and comes out of the dryer looking brand new.

Nice but sleeves a tad long but have button cuff.. I think I'd like it more just straight.. no cuff. Also to have it loose on you like the model size up... I wish I did... I ordered 2x.. fits like 1x...but I buy 2x to be loose.. not form fitting.. and it's not loose 😔

评论概述: Elegant V-neck fit perfect for any occasion
评论详情: I recently added this V-neck tunic to my wardrobe, and it’s quickly become a staple. The unique textured design adds a touch of elegance, making it stand out from other tops. The fit is flattering and comfortable, and the long sleeves are perfect for transitioning between seasons. I love how versatile it is—I can roll up the sleeves for a more casual look. It’s a great piece for both work and casual outings, pairing easily with jeans or dress pants. Definitely a chic and versatile addition to any wardrobe.
This is a great tunic top. It’s cut generously and long, so is very flattering. The fabric’s wavy pattern as well as the print add interest. It’s stretchy and comfortable, and true to listed size.
This is a great Winter Shirt. Long sleeve and warm. Looks fantastic. Fits perfectly and is well designed.
It looks very pretty I really like the color combination

评论概述: True to size, for home or work
评论详情: My wife says: "This white ribbed knit tunic top is true to size and would be an appropriate work shirt. The buttoned cuff and V-neck design give the top a tailored look. The knit fabric is soft and comfortable."

评论概述: I am in love with this tunic!
评论详情: The picture and ad is exactly what I received. It is true to fit. The texture of the material is soft and has a lot of give. There is some weight to this tunic and it feels like it's going to be great for fall weather. I love the lilac color. The stitching is also done well. I am very happy with the product and highly recommend this  tunic.

I 90% love this top.  The fabric is nice and light and the pattern is really pretty.  The fabric has this wavy texture that makes it unique.  It has a nice V neck and the sleeves are a good length...I hate too short long sleeves.  It does have a button cuff, but it's not tight on the wrist, in fact it's pretty loose.  The length is great...it covers the butt and is just this shy of being a tunic length.  It's a loose enough fit that it drapes nicely.  The only problem is the way it's sewn just under the V neck.  It has this little bit of a fold and then falls loose.  But I don't know if the way it's sewn is incorrect on just this shirt or it's just a flaw, but under the V neck when you move it creates a little bulge in the fabric, almost like it's too tight across the bust, but it isn't.  It's very noticeable, but that could be because of the texture of the fabric or the print.  Another color may not have the same issue.  I will be returning, but I wish I didn't have to because I love all of the other elements of the shirt.

More flattering on than expected! The sleeves were a tad odd with the buttons facing inwards rather than out as is the norm. Just an observation - I think it still looked fine on. Those swirls in the fabric are really a nice add to the look.

This is a well-made blouse with good stitching and hemming. The proportions are excellent, with sleeves that are properly long enough. The blouse is an excellent fit with a nice, soft material that flows nicely. The interesting pattern might take a little getting used to for me, but the color is so gorgeous I will endure. This is an overall well-created blouse that can be worn easily to an office or even out on a date. I recommend this top.
This long sleeve shirt is flattering and comfortable. The material has a nice texture and soft. I like that it is lower in the back to cover the back side. The neckline isn't too low and sits well.

评论概述: Very soft and a gorgeous color!
评论详情: This is such a nice top. It's like a slightly stretchy soft fabric that drapes over your body well. Very gorgeous lilac color and a fun way to add a pop of color to your closet!  Would definitely recommend!
